Address.value: 110 WEST 44TH STREET, NEW YORK, New York, 10036, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Founded in 1993 Take-Two consists of two wholly owned labels Rockstar Games and 2K. The firm is one of the world largest independent video game publishers on consoles PCs smartphones and tablets. Take-Two franchise portfolio is headlined by Grand Theft Auto 345 million units sold and contains other well-known titles such as NBA 2K Civilization Borderlands Bioshock and Xcom.
